interesting_fact: India is the largest democracy in the world and the second-most populous country.
The United States has the largest economy in the world.
China is the world's most populous country and the origin of the Great Wall.
Tokyo is the most populous metropolitan area in the world.
Germany is known for its engineering and automotive industry.
Brazil is home to the Amazon rainforest, the world's largest tropical rainforest.
Australia is the only country that is also a continent.
South Africa has three capital cities and is known as the 'Rainbow Nation'.
Canada is the second-largest country in the world by land area.
